originalText.text: I like my doctor melida knibbs , but i wish they didn’t take so long to attend you & it’s so hard to get a hold of her , when you go is always full… but she’s awesome !

text.text: I like my doctor melida knibbs , but i wish they didn’t take so long to attend you & it’s so hard to get a hold of her , when you go is always full… but she’s awesome !

originalText.text: Melida is super unprofessional. I am a health care professional and a patient. She does not take into consideration that I have a education background in healthcare, when I use healthcare language to explain my symptoms she laughs at my face and questions common knowledge. She should not even have a license. I asked for a referral to a dermatologist for acne and she told me I should just shower more often as if I am dirty. What type of sane doctor says this? On top of that when my dad who is also a patient of hers went to approach her about this situation she told him I was lying about this experience when she and I both know I was not. I do not recommend this NP. As a student nurse myself where I have shadowed multiple nurses at multiple hospitals and different areas, this is the worse nurse I have seen. Nursing is about caring for the patient as a whole and she only cares about her money. Save yourself from her. Any other doctor at this clinic is better.

originalText.text: Dr Melida is amazing but, her staff is horrible, so unprofessional. It is impossible to get a hold of someone on the phone to book an appointment!! And the service this staff gives you when you get there is just ridiculous, like are we really at the Doctor's office? Melida has been our family doctor for years but unfortunately I will be changing Doctor. I was going all the way to her office from far just for how amazing she is but I cannot deal with unprofessionalism and my children and I need to be up to date with our Doctor visits.

originalText.text: AMAZING DOCTOR!!! STAFF AND FRONT DESK ARE EXTREMELY RUDE!!!  CALL OVER 10 TIMES, NO ONE ANSWER!! TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT YOU HAVE TO GO IN PERSON...AND THE FRONT DESK GIVES ATTITUDE AND TURN YOU AROUND SAYING THE NEXT APPOINTMENT IS IN 4 WEEKS....NEVER ABLE TO BOOK AN APPOINTMENT...DOCTORS KNOWS ABOUT IT AND DOES NOTHING ABOUT IT!!!

originalText.text: Dr. Melida Knibbs is amazing. Unlike other doctors she takes what you say and feel into consideration and doesn’t try to brush you off with book knowledge and give you general treatment
